projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Caaring -  Cab Share App
projects.bodyText:
- Real-time Superhero Data: Fetches superhero details like power and strength via API, showing an image and attributes.
- Efficient & Interactive: Built with **JavaScript** and **APIs** for smooth and responsive performance.

projects.title: Quiz Application
projects.bodyText:
- Interactive Quiz: Allows users to take quizzes and displays results at the end.
- Built with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript** for a smooth and dynamic user experience.

projects.title: First Inning Score Detector
projects.bodyText:
- A web app that predicts the first inning score using a **Linear Regression** model.
- The model is trained, pickled, and used in **Flask** for predictions.
- Efficient use of **Machine Learning** techniques for accurate score prediction.
